projects.name: Tourist Recommendation System
projects.description: Developed a Tourist Recommendation System to offer personalized travel suggestions based on user preferences and location data. Designed to enhance the travel planning experience by providing tailored recommendations for attractions, dining, and activities.

projects.description: Developed a robust Face Recognition Attendance System using Machine Learning to automate and streamline attendance tracking processes. Implemented features for real-time face detection, recognition, and attendance logging, ensuring accuracy and efficiency in recording attendance data.
